job.command:
starver dev
set RANDOM_SEED=`expr &RANDOM_SEED; \* 1000`
echo echo "SOURCE_DIR: " &SOURCE_DIR; echo "RANDOM_SEED: " $RANDOM_SEED echo
pwd ls -al
ln -s ./GenerateVertex.C ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C set COMMAND='root4star -q -b ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C(0,&JOB_NEVENTS;,'$RANDOM_SEED',"@'$FILELIST'","vertex.txt")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $COMMAND eval '$COMMAND' >&! &OUT_DIR;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_vertex.log
set COMMAND="starsim -w 0 -b ./simWRequest.kumac nevents=&JOB_NEVENTS; config=&sample; run=&RUN_ID; seed=$RANDOM_SEED file=$FILEBASENAME.fzd vertexfile=vertex.txt" echo echo "Executing..." echo $COMMAND eval '$COMMAND' >&! &OUT_DIR;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_starsim.log
set COMMAND='root4star -q -b ./bfcMixer_pythia.C(&JOB_NEVENTS;,"@'$FILELIST'","'$FILEBASENAME'.fzd","P14igpp510","","W")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $COMMAND eval '$COMMAND' >&! &OUT_DIR;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_bfcMixer.log
ls -al
echo "End of job: tralala"
